SeaWorld Parks & Entertainment Employee Directory, Headcount & Staff | LeadIQ Learn more at LeadIQ.com Start free SeaWorld Parks & Entertainment Employee Directory Entertainment Providers Florida, United States 1001-5000 Employees SeaWorld Parks & Entertainmentâ¢ is a leading theme park and entertainment company providing experiences that matter and inspiring guests to protect animals and the wild wonders of our world. We are one of the worldâs foremost zoological organizations and a global leader in animal husbandry, behavioral management, veterinary care and animal welfare. We also rescue and rehabilitate marine and terrestrial animals that are ill, injured, orphaned or abandoned, with the goal of returning them to the wild. The SeaWorldÂ® and Busch GardensÂ® rescue teams have helped more than 40,000 animals in need over the last 50+ years.

We own or license a portfolio of recognized brands including SeaWorldÂ®, Busch GardensÂ®, Sesame PlaceÂ® and Sea RescueÂ®. Over our more than 50-year history, we have built a diversified portfolio of 12 destination and regional theme parks that are grouped in key markets across the United States. Many of our parks showcase our one-of-a-kind zoological collection and all of our parks feature a diverse array of thrill and family rides, shows, educational demonstrations and/or other attractions with broad demographic appeal which deliver memorable experiences and a strong value proposition for our guests.

We have also produced Parentâs Choice and Emmy Award winning shows like Sea Rescue and The Wildlife Docs that celebrate real & inspirational stories of rescue, rehabilitation and return to the wild by the animal rescue, animal care and veterinary teams at SeaWorld and Busch Gardens, in cooperation with our partners also committed to care for wildlife in need. SeaWorld Orlando consists of three major parks: SeaWorld Orlando, Discovery Cove and Aquatica . SeaWorld is located in the middle of Disney World and Universal Studios, and while this is the smallest of the three major theme parks in Orlando, do not let its size fool you. SeaWorld offers a big adventure for everyone. SeaWorld Orlando | Related Parks SeaWorld Orlando Theme Park SeaWorld has a setup unique to any other theme park in the world: one third of SeaWorld is dedicated as a theme park, one third encompasses a marine animal zoo and the final third is set up to be a marine animal hospital. Learn More SeaWorld Aquatica Aquatica is SeaWorld Orlando’s  water park. It is truly fun for the whole family with something for everyone including wave pools, slides and more. Learn More SeaWorld Discovery Cove Discovery Cove  is a unique hands-on park within SeaWorld that offers a unique vacation experience! Animal and aquatic lovers of all ages should experience this once in a lifetime opportunity. Learn More Everything About SeaWorld Check Out Our Helpful SeaWorld Articles Below: SeaWorld touring plan for teenagers SeaWorld Touring plan for young children SeaWorld for Adults SeaWorld for Guests with Autism SeaWorld for Guests in a Wheelchair Visiting SeaWorld while pregnant Orlando Hotels Hotels Near SeaWorld Enjoy luxurious accommodations, exclusive amenities, and easy access to SeaWorld’s thrilling attractions. Book now for the best rates and make your stay unforgettable! Hotels Near SeaWorld Why Is SeaWorld Orlando Special? SeaWorld’s philosophy is to educate the public about marine wildlife and how to preserve it for future generations. Before you visit, you might want to read about planning your day at SeaWorld . SeaWorld, like most theme parks, is built in a large circle, half of the entertainment is shows that have dedicated start times, roller coasters and rides are sprinkled throughout the park, and then animal encounters are strategically located next to the shows. SeaWorld has done an incredible job of making the learning experience fun and exciting. The shows entertain you, but also teach you a little about the animals and their habitat, the roller coasters keep you entertained and the animal encounters (think of a zoo encounter) are planned to educate you about the animals, and what we need to do as a society to help them continue to flourish in nature. There are many attractions and special events which provide a refreshing and distinctive experience for families. Not many people know this but the majority of the animals you will see at SeaWorld have been injured at sea and the doctors on staff at SeaWorld rescued them from disastrous consequences. After their rehabilitation, many of the animals were not fit to return to the wild so SeaWorld developed shows around them. Attractions and Shows SeaWorld has recently been called Orlando’s Roller Coaster Capital and for good reason. SeaWorld offers over 20 theme park rides, with 6 of those rides being roller coasters, 18 animal displays or experiences, and 5 entertaining shows. Click here to learn about all the shows and rides at SeaWorld. Special Tip : If you are planning to see all the theme parks in Orlando, you might want to visit SeaWorld in the middle of your vacation. Most of the shows do not start until 11am, and quite frankly the shows at night are always a little more entertaining. This will give you and your family an opportunity to sleep in and rest. Even though you are on vacation, walking around the theme parks will be quite tiring. In addition to these shows, SeaWorld also offers fun events throughout the year. Some of these events require special admission tickets such as: Halloween Spootakular , SeaWorld Howl-O-Scream , 7 Seas Food Festival, Summer Spectacular, and Christmas Celebration. SeaWorld Tickets SeaWorld will only take you a day to see pretty much everything so you do not need a multi day ticket unless you are looking to visit Aquatica too, then we would recommend a two day ticket. Aquatica is located just down the road from SeaWorld, but if you want to enjoy both parks you should really spend two days (one at each park). One of the unusual attractions about SeaWorld is that you can add all day dining to your SeaWorld tickets . This add on varies in cost but on average expect to spend an additional $39 per person. All Day Dining allows you to eat every 90 minutes at restaurants located throughout the park, and  you get an entree, drink and dessert. Here is a great article about dining at SeaWorld . This is a great deal especially, if you are going to be eating both lunch and dinner at SeaWorld. Our spacious homes offer all the comforts you need, plus the convenience of being close to SeaWorld’s exciting marine adventures. Explore the wonders of SeaWorld, from thrilling rides to amazing marine life exhibits, and relax in comfortable accommodations nearby. Book Now Where to Stay When Visiting SeaWorld Orlando This amazing theme park is located equal distance between Walt Disney World and Universal in Central Florida, so there are many choices but here are a few great hotels near SeaWorld for you to choose among. For the best pricing on hotels, you will want to look in the area of Lake Buena Vista. This area is very close to SeaWorld but it also caters to Walt Disney World travelers, so pricing is much more competitive. Vacation homes are another wonderful lodging option and if your primary reason for visiting Orlando is SeaWorld, look for a vacation home in Kissimmee . It is much easier to get to SeaWorld from the Kissimmee area than it is from Davenport or along the 192 interstate corridors. Inside Tip: To get the best deal on your SeaWorld Orlando Vacation , you will want to book a vacation package, which comes complete with theme park tickets and hotel accommodations. Most of our customers book their SeaWorld Vacation as a package, offering them the most savings. Touring SeaWorld We want you to know that Orlandovacation.com is here to help you plan your SeaWorld vacation. In order to help our guests we have written many articles to help families plan their vacation, please feel free to reach out to us: through web chat or on the phone ( 1-800-641-4008 ) and we will be more than happy to assist. It does not matter the make up of your family or group, everyone will love SeaWorld. Need Tickets?
